item.title: How to Close the Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Close the Microsoft Windows Clock: With Click With Hover With Menu With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: Watch a tutorial video: How to Close the Microsoft Windows Clock With Click Step 1: First open Windows Clock. In the upper right corner, click the “Close” or “X” button. The Windows Clock app closes. How to Close the Microsoft Windows Clock With Hover Step 1: Open Windows Clock.
